author: senh
title: Cards catcher Molina will try to play with splint over thumb
text: BING NEWS: Cards catcher Molina will try to play with splint over thumb Cards catcher Molina will try to play with splint over thumb ST. LOUIS (AP) - St. Louis Cardinals catcher Yadier Molina will try to play in the NL division series wearing a splint to protect his injured left thumb. The All-Star catcher met with a hand ... 10/5/2015 - 11:18 am | View Link Cards Catcher Molina Will Try to Play With Splint Over Thumb St. Louis Cardinals catcher Yadier Molina will try to play in the NL division series wearing a splint to protect his injured left thumb. The All-Star catcher met with a hand specialist on Monday and it was determined that a ligament injury hasn't healed. 10/5/2015 - 11:08 am | View Link Game blog: After win, Cards encouraged by news on Piscotty and Heyward threw him out easily for a double play.
